attributes.name: total-pages
attributes.description: The total number of pages to display in the pager. Should NOT be specified if using {@link pageSize} and {@link totalCount} properties

attributes.name: type
attributes.description: The type of pager. Defaults to `'standard'`.

attributes.name: href-format
attributes.description: An optional property to configure where a user will be navigated when changing pages (e.g. deeplinking to pages)

attributes.name: hide-input
attributes.description: Whether you would like to give the user the ability to type in a page to go to or not

attributes.name: page-size
attributes.description: The size of a page of results. MUST be used with {@link totalCount}. DO NOT use this with {@link totalPages}

attributes.name: total-count
attributes.description: The total number of results. MUST be used with {@link pageSize}. DO NOT use this with {@link totalPages}

properties.name: totalPages
properties.description: The total number of pages to display in the pager. Should NOT be specified if using {@link pageSize} and {@link totalCount} properties

properties.name: type
properties.description: The type of pager. Defaults to `'standard'`.

properties.name: hrefFormat
properties.description: An optional property to configure where a user will be navigated when changing pages (e.g. deeplinking to pages)

properties.name: hideInput
properties.description: Whether you would like to give the user the ability to type in a page to go to or not

properties.name: pageSize
properties.description: The size of a page of results. MUST be used with {@link totalCount}. DO NOT use this with {@link totalPages}

properties.name: totalCount
properties.description: The total number of results. MUST be used with {@link pageSize}. DO NOT use this with {@link totalPages}

events.name: change
events.description: When there's a change on zui-pager raise this event with current-page's value

cssProperties.name: --zui-pager-color
cssProperties.description: Used in several shadow DOM elements to theme zui-pager to a color
